name: phonebook-app
description: A Phonebook application with a React frontend and an Express.js backend. It allows users to view, add, and delete contacts. The backend serves a REST API, and minor frontend adjustments were made to align with the new API endpoints.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf Backend/dist && cd Frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../Backend && rm -rf ./dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git config --global core.autocrlf input && git add . && git commit -m "Full Deployment" && git push

author: Dzrekey001
